name: Fractured Headings from the Yellow Pages A-Z Trivia Game | Brain Teasers | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
Attorneys.

	There are many subheads under "Attorneys." They range from "Attorneys--Accident, Personal Injury and Property Damage" to "Attorneys--Wrongful Death Law."

Bicycles.

	In my phone book, "Bicycles" and its subheads fall between "Bibles" and "Billiard Parlors."

Cremation.

	It's actually "Cremation Services." On the same page are: Crime and Trauma Scene Cleanup, Crutches, Cryogenics, Culverts, Curtains, Cushions, and Cutlery.

Dumpsters.

	Other D headings: Dogs--Narcotic Detection, Donuts, Dumbwaiters, Dyslexia Information and Treatment.

Espresso & Expresso.

	Other E headings: Ear Piercing Services, Electrolysis, Emu Products (no kidding), and Eviction Services.

Furniture.

	Other F headings: Face Painting, Fingerprinting, and Fumigating.

Grocers.

	Other G headings: Gang Violence Intervention, Gazebos, Glaziers, and Gold Fish.

Hypnosis.

	Other H headings: Helium, Horseshoers, and Hydroponics.

Insurance.

	Other I headings: Ice Scuptors, Infertility, and Irish Goods.

Jeans.

	Other J headings: Janitors, Jingles, Jugglers, and Juices.

Kennels.

	"Quenelle" is a French name for an oval-shaped dumpling that's made with fish. They are light, rich, and yummy. Other K headings: Kayaks, Kilns, Kites, and Kung Fu.

Libraries.

	Other L headings: Landslide Repair, Limbs--Artificial, Liquidators (What are THOSE??), and Literary Agents.

Marriage Ceremonies.

	Other M headings: Macaroni Machinery, Mini Blinds, and Monorail Systems.

Newspapers.

	Other N headings: Nail Salons, Noodles, Nuts--Edible.

Orchestras.

	Other O headings: Occult Supplies, Olives, Organs, and Oysters.

Pawnbrokers & Pawn brokers.

	Other P headings: Parachutes, Pillows, Portable Toilets, and Pumpkin Patches.

Recreation.

	Other R headings: Rabbis, Ravioli (See Pasta), River Trips, and Rubber Bands.

Security.

	Other S headings: Salads, Santa Claus Services, Shims, and Shrink-Wrapping.

Transmissions.

	Other T headings: Tattoos--Removed, Terrazzo, Toxicologists, and Toy Designers.

Upholsterers.

	Other U headings: Ultra Violet Coating, Umbrellas, and Underwear--Retail.

Veterinary Hospitals.

	Other V headings: Valet Services, Vegetable Concentrates, and Virtual Reality.

Weight Loss.

	Other W headings: Wakeboarding, Waterfalls, and Windsurfing Equipment.

X-ray labs & X ray labs.

	Not many headings under X.

Yogurt & Yoghurt.

	Other Y headings: Yarn, Yeast, and Yoga.

Zoos.

	Other Z headings: ZIP codes, Zinc, and Zippers.
